account.descriptionLink: The House of FERG will serve as the central DAO council for the FERG community, tasked with steering the development, governance, and strategic direction of the FERG ecosystem. By uniting key community members under a structured decision-making framework, the House of FERG ensures transparency, inclusivity, and collective growth.
account.name: FERG Improvement Proposal 1: Formation of the House of FERG

options.label: Approve the formation of The House of FERG
Reject the formation of The House of FERG
